projects.name: Shopping Cart
projects.description: Utilized the Fake Store API to fetch product details, used React Suspense and conditional rendering. Conceptualized the cart functionality and use of dynamic counters for updating and summation of pre-payment aggregate amount Designed the project using third party libraries like styled components and Material UI to make it more interactive and mobile responsive. Created entire project with typescript to have a better understanding of using types with dierent react hooks.
